title: Latest updates: East Midlands Live Tuesday 31 October 2017 - BBC News
summary: labour activist 'warned ' about pursuing rape claim .
breastfeeding mum 'told to leave ' speed awareness course .
councillor 'to sue police ' after child sex case thrown out .
nottingham men to compete in wingsuit competition in america .

text: reading 3-1 nottingham forest

text: panthers suffer first-leg loss in zurich

text: leeds united 1-2 derby county

documents.title: our live coverage has ended
text: regular live coverage on this page has ended for the day , but breaking news , sport and travel updates will continue to appear through the night .
east midlands live returns from 08:00 tomorrow morning .

documents.title: m1 reopens after lorry fire
text: good news for rush hour traffic
# m1 has reopened southbound btwn j21-j20 # leicestershire .
2 lanes remain closed however and at 20:00 it will be closed again for resurfacing

documents.title: your halloween pumpkin carvings
text: just before we head off - here are some of your fantastic pumpkin carvings you 've sent into us .
happy halloween !
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : cloudy but mild evening ahead
text: it will stay cloudy and dry overnight with skies clearing a little by dawn .
it will generally be a milder night .
tomorrow will be a bright start but clouds will gradually build up in the afternoon .
it will stay dry and fairly mild with highs of 13c ( 55f ) .
author: Alexandra Hamilton
BBC weather presenter

documents.title: labour activist 'warned ' about pursuing rape claim
text: a labour activist from nottingham has revealed she was raped at a party event and that a senior labour official discouraged her from reporting the attack .
in an interview with pm on bbc radio 4 bex bailey said she had been 19 when she was raped by someone senior to her within the labour party who was not an mp .
she said she had `` tried to pretend it had n't happened '' and did not report the attack to the police at the time .

she said : `` i was scared , i felt ashamed , i know that the labour party , like any family , loves a good gossip - and i did n't want people to know and i also was worried that i would n't be believed if i did . ''
the 25-year-old has in the past been involved in campaigning with the labour mp for leicester liz kendall .
labour said it has launched an independent investigation which will look at `` claims that a party employee acted improperly over these 2011 allegations '' .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: vr pensioner namechecked by zuckerberg
text: vr pensioner namechecked by zuckerberg

documents.title: cctv appeal after city centre assault
text: cctv images of a man police want to speak to in connection with an assault have been released .
a man suffered serious injuries during the assault at the revolution bar in nottingham 's cornerhouse .
nottinghamshire police said it happened on 2 september at about 02:45 but the images have only just been released .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cash machine blasted with gas canister
text: cash machine blasted with gas canister

documents.title: mass brawl reports prompts investigation
text: an investigation has been launched after reports of a fight involving 20 people in sneinton .
nottinghamshire police were called to sneinton dale yesterday at about 18:40 .
they said they are still investigating what happened and are appealing for witnesses and anyone with dash-cam footage .
nobody has been arrested .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cctv appeal to find candle theives
text: police are hoping this cctv footage will help them find candle thieves in chaddesden .
fifty large yankee candles were stolen from the paper kiss card shop on nottingham road in the early hours of 17 october .
warning : third party content may contain adverts .
police want to speak to the two people seen in the footage about what happened .
we would like to talk to anyone who thinks they recognises the two people on the bikes or anyone who has been offered a yankee candle for sale in sus circumstances .
we are also looking into the possibility of a link with a robbery at the nearby co-op on woollaton road the day after , when two men were seen to escape on bikes . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: facebook founder describes vr gran 'as awesome '
text: this is 80-year-old dorothy howard - she travels the world using a virtual reality headset .
she was namechecked by none other than mark zuckerberg , founder and ceo of facebook .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: no injuries in m1 lorry fire
text: some good news from the ambulance service about the lorry fire on the m1 in leicestershire earlier .
east midlands ambulance service said they were alerted to the incident but were n't required as there were no injuries .
the southbound carriageway is expected to remain shut for several more hours .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: thieves target cash machines 20 times in 18 months
text: there have been two more attempts to steal cash machines in leicestershire and rutland today .
police said an off-licence in cardinals walk in leicester was broken into early this morning .
there was an attempt to steal the cash machine inside but intruders were unsuccessful .
also overnight , a standalone cash machine in the co-op car park in burley road , oakham , was broken into .
cash was stolen .
it 's not thought the two crimes are linked but police are looking at similarities with previous thefts - including the theft in market harborough .
there have now been 20 in leicestershire and rutland in the last 18 months .
a number of officers and staff are involved in the investigations and they are working tirelessly to bring those responsible to justice .
however we also need your help to catch these criminals .
the thefts are noisy work and the perpetrators may work up to 15 minutes each time in the middle of the night with lights . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : thieves use gas canisters to steal cash from atm
text: this is the moment a cash machine in lutterworth was attacked using gas canisters and a chain saw .
it happened at the post office on george street early on saturday morning .
thieves got away with the cash inside .
we know we have had a number of similar incidents recently and we are working with other forces to try and find and arrest those responsible . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cattle market sale to help fund swimming pool
text: more details have emerged about how a new swimming pool at moorways in derby will be paid for .
the city council said it has identified where about 40 % of the funding will come from - this includes the money raised by selling the cattle market .
a consultation with just over 200 people found support for the design of the facility , which includes a 50 metre pool , cafe and soft play area .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: halloween house raises money for charity
text: this spooktacular display in south wiston took tina walton seven hours to make .
people are invited to have a look round the property later this evening .
the family , who have been decorating their house in this way for about ten years , are raising money for charity .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: rare 'body snatcher ' mushroom found in clumber park
text: an `` extremely rare '' fungus known as the powdercap strangler has been spotted at clumber park .
the mushroom is a parasitic fungus that grows by `` body snatching '' another grassland fungus .
it is two-coloured which is caused by the strangler infecting and eventually overcoming its host .

dr gareth griffith , reader in mycology at aberystwyth university , said : `` rather like the monster in the film alien it takes over the body of its host ( cystoderma amianthinum ) and its mushroom erupts in place of the host 's mushroom .
`` this is a really exciting find . ''
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: trapped m1 southbound traffic to be released
text: some people on the m1 in leicestershire have been stuck for around two hours after a lorry caught fire between junctions 21 and 20 .
the road has now reopened northbound - these people heading southbound are soon to be on their way .
highways england has just opened the outside lane of the carriageway to release trapped traffic .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: m1 lorry caught fire while carrying aerosol cans
text: this is the remains of the lorry that caught fire on the m1 in leicestershire this afternoon .
it had been carrying domestic products including aerosol cans .
the fire service has said the fire is now `` under control '' and they are helping with the recovery and clean up .
the road remains closed southbound between junctions 21 and 20 for the m69 and lutterworth .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: panthers prepare for historic match
text: panthers prepare for historic match

documents.title: m1 reopens northbound
text: good news about the m1 from highways england .
the n/b carriageway has reopened on the # m1 btwn j20 and j21 .
the s/b remains closed j21-j20 for recovery operations .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : lorry fire closes m1
text: this is the dramatic footage of a lorry fire which has shut the m1 between junctions 20 and 21 near lutterworth .
the motorway remains closed in both directions although the police said the northbound carriageway is due to reopen `` shortly '' .
thanks to dr william toff for the video .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: feeding mum 'embarrassed ' when asked to leave course
text: a breastfeeding mum says she was `` embarrassed ' and `` shocked '' when was told to leave a speed awareness course .
claire jefford from west bridgford brought her 10-week-old baby daughter to the course but was told she was n't allowed in .
aa drivetech , which runs the course , says it allows mums to take a break to feed , but that the baby must be cared for by someone else in a separate room .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: rape warning video sparks 'national debate '
text: leicestershire police have said their video about a fictional rape has sparked a `` national debate on social media '' .
the first of a two-part film has been watched more than 40,000 times since it was posted yesterday .
it highlights the importance of preserving evidence if you are raped by not washing or deleting messages .
the reaction on social media has been overwhelming .
it 's plain that the first film has done what we hoped - to spark that discussion - and i 'm really pleased that people are sharing their views , and their experiences , online . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man suffers head injury 'after attack '
text: a 41-year-old man is in a critical condition after he hit his head on the floor after an alleged attack .
it happened outside gerard street fish bar on burton road in derby on 23 october , derbyshire police have said .
the man was taken to nottingham 's queen 's medical centre .
police say a 61-year-old man was arrested and has been bailed pending further inquiries .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: lorry fire closes m1 in leicestershire
text: the m1 is closed in both directions between j20 and j21 due to a lorry fire .
highways england has said emergency services are on the way .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: hospital staff create pumpkin display for fundraiser
text: these scary-tastic pumpkins have been perfectly carved by staff at the radiology department at qmc in nottingham .
patients can now catch a glimpse of them displayed in the children 's x-ray department .
people can pay to vote for their favourite with funds going into a pot for the hospital .
if you go down to children 's x-ray today you 're sure of a terrifying surprise !
such an imaginative fundraiser # happyhalloween
hi maryam .
this is a fundraiser for @ twitterid and is organised by staff at children 's xray , including @ twitterid over to you , tracey !
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: road reopens after rooftop man arrested
text: police in leicester have confirmed the reopening of roads in the city centre after a man was spotted on the roof of a building .
a man has been arrested on sus of causing public nuisance .
# leicester st peters lane & causeway lane reopened btwn churchgate and vaughan way @ 11:45 .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: spooky house attracts hundreds of children
text: would you dare to enter this house ?
mark shelton turns his spondon home into a `` witches ' castle '' every year for halloween .
originally he did it just for his children , then their cousins and friends wanted to see it , now it 's a popular local attraction .
he said : `` around 300-400 children came last year .
they were queuing up in the street . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : greetings card slave worker freed from loft
text: this is the moment police found a man who had been locked in a loft and was forced to work 20 hours a day making greetings cards .
the polish immigrant who did not want to be named was locked in edward zielinski 's loft in hyson green .
zielinski used violence against two immigrants and controlled their id documents .
the 42-year-old admitted two counts of modern slavery and was jailed for three years and four months yesterday .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breastfeeding mum 's 'shock ' at course ban
text: breastfeeding mum 's 'shock ' at course ban

documents.title: watch : house turned into a spooktacular maze
text: could this be nottinghamshire 's scariest house ?
matt hall and adam johnson from stapleford have created a spooky maze for halloween at their home .
last year they had about 500 visitors and now final preparations are being made for tonight .
author: Andy Whittaker
Presenter, BBC Radio Nottingham

documents.title: vandals light charity bonfire early
text: staff and volunteers at the gate hangs well pub in syston have spent over a month gathering scrap wood for a bonfire .
the huge pile was going to be lit on 4 november at a charity bonfire night event but on sunday vandals lit it early .
pub landlord neil henderson is still hoping the event can go ahead but they do need more wood .
he 's made an appeal for any donations of scrap wood or old pallets .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: picture of knife point robbery released
text: a cctv image of a man wielding a knife and threatening shop staff has been released in a renewed appeal .
the man walked into a shop in kirklington road in rainworth and threatened the shop assistant before fleeing with cash , nottinghamshire police said .
he 's described as white and in his early 20s and spoke with a local accent .
it happened at about 10:40 on 19 october .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: motorcyclist dies following crash
text: a motorcyclist involved in a crash on the a53 near buxton on sunday has died .
the 49-year-old man from leek was involved in a collision with a vw van and had been receiving treatment at the royal stoke university hospital .

documents.title: vandals target groby park
text: parish councillors in groby have said a spate of anti social behaviour in the village is down to a lack of community policing .
this damage was caused at martinshaw park over the weekend .
bottles were found broken on the ground , play equipment was broken and the benches were broken up to start fires nearby .
these families told the bbc it 's `` sad '' this has happened .
police said : these types of thoughtless acts of vandalism have a knock on effect on the local community and we would urge anyone who has any information to contact us .
since the middle of july we 've had three reports of anti-social behaviour in the recreational area and we are working closely with partner agencies to address the concerns raised . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : england 's 'spookiest ' castle
text: eeekk this is apparently england 's spookiest castle .
there 's been several ghostly experiences reported at the building in bolsover .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: sisters tribute to parents in memorial wood
text: a woman has travelled from her home in the us to see a memorial for her parents at bradgate park .
jane moved from leicestershire to north carolina 13 years ago .
she had the bronze leaf plaque made for the new memorial wood as a surprise for her sister liz .
despite living on the other side of the atlantic , jane told bbc radio leicester she still tries to visit the park as often as possible .
she said : `` i 've never ever lost the love of bradgate park and every trip we have back we have to come back here .
it 's really because it has memories for me and my husband but especially for me with my parents .
`` we spent so many years coming to bradgate park . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: nottingham men to compete in wingsuit competition in america
text: it looks like something straight out of a james bond movie but wingsuit flying is the real deal with no special effects required .
three engineers from nottingham will be heading to america to compete in the wingsuit world championships .
they will have to perform acrobatics to impress the judges to take the title .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: councillor 'to sue police ' after child sex case thrown out
text: a nottinghamshire county councillor cleared of child sex offences says he intends to take legal action against nottinghamshire police and the police and crime commissioner .
the case against jason zadrozny was dropped yesterday when the crown prosecution service said it would be offering `` no evidence '' at the start of his trial .
mr zadrozny said the whole thing 's been drawn out for too long .

he said : `` it has been very nearly three years hanging over my head , the worst things you can be accused of , so it has been a very stressful time my father had a huge heart attack just a couple of days after i was originally arrested .
`` he never got to see me clear my name , it has been a pretty tough time really . ''
police and crime commissioner paddy tipping said it was an operational issue and `` entirely for the chief constable '' while the force said it had a duty to investigate the allegations .
mr zadrozny was due to stand as a liberal democrat in ashfield in the 2015 general election but was suspended from the party following his arrest .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: vardys at pride of britain awards
text: leicester city footballer jamie vardy and his wife rebekah were among the famous faces at the pride of britain awards last night .
the ceremony celebrates the achievements of `` truly remarkable people '' and was also attended by prince william .
thank you for a wonderful evening @ twitterid congratulations to all the incredible winners !
your stories are truly inspirational # prideofbritain
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police concern for man on rooftop
text: i 've got some more information on that `` police incident '' in leicester - police have said there is concern for the welfare of a man seen on the roof of a building in the highcross area of the city .
causeway lane and churchgate are currently closed .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breastfeeding mum 'told to leave ' speed awareness course
text: a mum from nottingham claims she was 'forced to leave ' a speed awareness course because she was n't allowed to breastfeed her baby .
claire jefford was told her ten-week-old daughter maude would have to be cared for by someone else outside the room during the four-hour long session .

she said : `` they said someone could look after the baby and i go out to breastfeed but my husband would have had to sit in the corridor for four hours with a five-year-old and a three-year-old , which is n't appropriate .
`` going out to breastfeed i would have probably missed at a time 20 minutes of the course . ''
claire says she hopes to do the course when she has finished breastfeeding maude .
aa drivetech , which runs the courses , says it has a clear policy of not allowing under 16s to attend .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'police incident ' closes city roads
text: i 'm just trying to find out more about this `` police incident '' and will let you know when i have more information .
# leicester st peters lane & causeway lane closed from churchgate due to a police incident
any idea what the incident is ?
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: pub 's pumpkin petrifies patrons
text: no wonder this pumpkin is causing a stir .
this rather unusually large one was grown by the owners of the six barrels drafthouse in hockley - and apparently it 's one of their smaller specimens .
send us your best pumpkin photos and we 'll feature them in a facebook gallery .
author: Dean Jackson
The Beat, BBC Radio Nottingham

documents.title: travel : delays on east midlands roads
text: there 's also slow traffic causing the usual delays at this time of the morning , particularly on the m1 around junctions 21a and 21 and the m69 .
author: BBC News Travel

documents.title: consultation opens over new £ 58m college
text: a public consultation has opened over plans for a new campus for nottingham college costing £ 58m .
the six storey development will be built alongside the refurbished broadmarsh shopping centre on canal street .
the college will be built below the nottingham contemporary and will be called the skills hub .
it comes following the merger of central college and new college nottingham earlier this year .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: power cut in leicester
text: ca n't boil the kettle ?
this might be why .
we are aware of a # powercut in the # leicester # le3 and surrounding area .
we aim to restore all supplies by 09:30 .
andi .
barri , wtf is wrong with you forehead ?
it goes on for days ?
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: join us for our live coverage
text: good morning nottinghamshire , derbyshire and leicestershire .
amy woodfield and i will be writing the updates on today 's live page with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel .
if you 'd like to get in touch with us , you can send an email , or use facebookor twitter .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live
